fr.dauphine.robombastic.impl

Class GeneralInfoImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.dauphine.robombastic.impl.GeneralInfoImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BotContext.Info, GeneralInfo, java.io.Serializable

    public class GeneralInfoImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements GeneralInfo, java.io.Serializable
    Implementation of GeneralInfo - Represents the informations given to the bot by the game Usage of Singleton Pattern to be sure to have only one instance of the class shared among all other classes
    Author:
    Meyer
    See Also:
    GeneralInfo, Serialized Form

        public int getRadarSize()
        Description copied from interface: GeneralInfo
